org.apache.zab

Class QuorumZab

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.zab.QuorumZab

  • public class QuorumZab
extends Object
    Quorum zab implementation. This class manages the quorum zab servers. For each server, it can be in one of three states : ELECTING, FOLLOWING, LEADING. Among all the nodes, there's only one server can be established leader.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected org.apache.zab.QuorumZab.FailureCaseCallback failureCallback
      Callback which will be called in different points of code path to simulate different kinds of failure cases.

      Callback interface for testing purpose.

      • QuorumZab

        public QuorumZab(StateMachine stateMachine,
         Properties prop)
        Constructs a QuorumZab instance by recovering from log directory.
        Parameters:
        stateMachine - the state machine implementation of clients.
        prop - the Properties object stores the configuration of QuorumZab.

      • QuorumZab

        public QuorumZab(StateMachine stateMachine,
         Properties prop,
         String joinPeer)
        Constructs a QuorumZab instance by joining an existing cluster.
        Parameters:
        stateMachine - the state machine implementation of clients.
        prop - the Properties object stores the configuration of QuorumZab.
        joinPeer - the id of peer you want to join in.

    • Method Detail

      • getFuture

        public Future<Void> getFuture()
        Get the future of the background working thread of QuorumZab.

      • send

        public void send(ByteBuffer message)
        Sends a message to Zab. Any one can call call this interface. Under the hood, followers forward requests to the leader and the leader will be responsible for broadcasting.
        Parameters:
        message - message to send through Zab

      • remove

        public void remove(String peerId)
        Removes a peer from the cluster.
        Parameters:
        peerId - the id of the peer who will be removed from the cluster.

        public void shutdown()
              throws InterruptedException
        Shut down the Zab.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - in case of it's interrupted.
